title: Favorite Typeface Pairs
content:
Hi All,

I am a graphic design graduate student working on my thesis and am looking for some help. My thesis is about pairing typefaces and helping novice design students create successful typeface pairs with guidance from expert designers. I would love your input on what your favorite typeface pairs are and why. Any input would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks much in advance.
author: hsavage

comments.content: Have you searched Typophile for this topic?
